prefix=%INSTALL_PLACEHOLDER%

libdir=${exec_prefix}/lib

Name: libbson
Description: The libbson BSON serialization library
Version: 1.28.0

Libs: -L${libdir} -lbson-static-1.0
Cflags:  -DBSON_STATIC -I${prefix}/include/libbson-1.0
